laboratory_examinations.findings: Widening of intercellular spaces in the epidermis and a reduced number of small, poorly-formed desmosomes.
A homozygous deletion of C at nucleotide 888 within exon 5, designated 888delC, resulting in a premature termination codon 123 bp downstream.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Histopathologic examination of fresh peeling skin lesion
laboratory_examinations.findings: Compact orthokeratosis with hypergranulosis and focal areas of parakeratosis. Acantholysis in the granular layer with detached individual keratinocytes and dyskeratotic cells were seen. In the dermis, there was a superficial perivascular mixed infiltrate of polymorphonuclear leukocytes and eosinophils.
